title: The Abduction: Episode 291
description:
Andrew Ramsay was a 51 year old Accountant living with his partner Beverley in Glasgow. One evening, as the couple strolled back from the local pub, the police pulled up outside their house and took Andrew to the police questioning for questioning.

Beverley could never have guessed it was the last time she would see Andrew.

In this episode of the UK True Crime podcast, I cover the confusing story of just what happened to Andrew.
